question:
Positif:.....?    Negative: they play football every sunday
Introgative:......?
fill in the table!
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

positif: they play football every Sunday

negative : they don't play football every Sunday

introgative : are they play football every Sunday?

Yang atas gua salah interogative nya
Yang bener : do they play football every sunday?

The text is a part of a song. Read it to answer questions 22 to 23.

I know a girl
She puts the color inside of my world
But she’s just like a maze
Where all the walls all continually change

Fathers, be good to your daughters
Daughters will love you like you do
Girls become lovers who turn into mothers
So mothers, be good to your daughters, too.

22.	What is the song about? *


a,Family.

b,Mothers.

c,Daughters

d,Fathers




​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

20. a. Javanese Hawk 21. a. Very Big 22. a. Family

Penjelasan:

20. D. A hike in the forest

21. C. very old

22. C. daughters

related_questions.question:
1.    Complete the dialog by correcting the words in the brackets.
Diyan : (1/ want/go/ Daly city)
(the bus/ go / Daly city)?
Hayu : No, it doesn't.
Diyan : Where does it go?
Hayu : (it/go/ downtown).
Diyan: How do I get to Daly City?
Hayu
(cross / the street) and (wait / the next Number 14).
Source: http://squirrelspace.blogspot.co.id
2.
a.
Choose the correct time expression used with the present continuous tense.
What are you doing (tomorrow / yesterday) afternoon?
b. (Currently / Current) we're working on the Anderson account.
What are you doing (this/next) afternoon?
d. Thomas is presenting at the meeting (on / in) April.
Change the word in the brackets into past tense form.
C.
3.
1 (wake) up around 8:30 a.m. in the morning yesterday. When I (look) at the
clock 1 (say), "Oh, I'm getting late for the Yoga class and my teacher is going to
punish me for this." It (be not) the first time for me to be late for the class.

TOLONG DIBANTU YA KAK NO 1.2.3​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Dyan : I want to go to Daly city.

Does the bus go to Daly city?

Hayu : No, It doesn't.

Dyan : Where does it go?

Hayu : It goes downtown.

Dyan : How do i get to Daly city?

Hayu : Go cross the street and wait the next bus number 14.

2. a. Tomorrow

b. Currently

c. This

d. In

3. woke,looked,said,was not,

Penjelasan:

hope you find this helpful^•^

related_questions.question: Change the sentences into negative and interrogative a. my mother always give mea a present for my birthday b. he knew the answer off the question c. rudi and anto arema playing badminton now

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. - My mother never gives me a present for my birthday?

? Does your mother give you a present for your birthday?

2. - He didn't know the answer of the question

? Did he know the answer of the question?

3. - Rudi and Anto are not playing badminton now

? Are they playing badminton now?

related_questions.question:
5. i saw an accident last night. somebody ……..an ambulance but nobody …… so the ambulance ………..    a. called – was injured – wasn’t needed
b. called – injured – didn’t need 
c. was called – was injured – wasn’t needed 
d. called – injured – wasn’t needed

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A) Called - Was Injured - Wasn't Needed

Penjelasan:

I saw an accident last night. Somebody called an ambulance but nobody was injured so the ambulance wasn't needed. (Aku melihat sebuah kecelakaan tadi malam. Seseorang menelepon sebuah ambulans namun tidak ada yang terluka sehingga ambulans tersebut tidak diperlukan)

Karena dia di masa lalu, maka kita gunakan simple past Dan past perfect.

V1 V2 V3

Call Called Called

  • Untuk kesatu, kita gunakan Called karena kalimat tersebut lebih sesuai dengan kata called.
  • Untuk kedua, kita gunakan Was Injured karena pada bagian tersebut lebih logis bila diartikan sebagai "tidak ada yang terluka/nobody was injured" dibandingkan "tidak ada terluka/nobody injured"
  • Untuk ketiga, kita gunakan Wasn't Needed karena artinya adalah tidak diperlukan sedangkan jawaban yang tidak tepat adalah didn't need karena artinya tidak perlu.

Jadi jawaban yang tepat adalah

A) Called - Was Injured - Wasn't Needed
